mapper.sql: a.warnInWeightId AS "warnInWeightId", a.departmentId AS "departmentId", a.officeId AS "officeId", a.code AS "code", a.inWeight AS "inWeight", a.collectWeight AS "collectWeight", a.trashId AS "trashId", a.inPerson AS "inPerson", a.collectId AS "collectId", a.inTime AS "inTime", a.warnTime AS "warnTime", a.createDate AS "createDate", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_warn_inWeight a ORDER BY a.createDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_warn_inWeight( warnInWeightId, departmentId, officeId, code, inWeight, collectWeight, trashId, inPerson, collectId, inTime, warnTime, createDate, remarks ) VALUES ( #{warnInWeightId}, #{departmentId}, #{officeId}, #{code}, #{inWeight}, #{collectWeight}, #{trashId}, #{inPerson}, #{collectId}, #{inTime}, #{warnTime}, #{createDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_warn_inWeight SET departmentId = #{departmentId}, officeId = #{officeId}, code = #{code}, inWeight = #{inWeight}, collectWeight = #{collectWeight}, trashId = #{trashId}, inPerson = #{inPerson}, collectId = #{collectId}, inTime = #{inTime}, warnTime = #{warnTime}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE warnInWeightId = #{warnInWeightId}
